actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment, S. Rept. 93-709.

official_title: Resolves that, in holding hearings, reporting such hearings, and making investigations as authorized by sections 134(a) and 136 of the Legislative Reorganization Act of 1946, as amended.

summary.text: (LATEST SUMMARY) Authorizes additional expenditures for the Senate Committee on Foreign Relations for a study of matters pertaining to the foreign policy of the United States. Declares that the expenses of the Committee shall not exceed $708,800 of which amount not to exceed $75,000 shall be available for the procurement of the services of individual consultants or organizations.

titles.title: Resolves that, in holding hearings, reporting such hearings, and making investigations as authorized by sections 134(a) and 136 of the Legislative Reorganization Act of 1946, as amended.
